messages.400: Do you know why I pulled you over right meow? Your request syntax was all over the road. I'm not kidding right meow, that's dangerous driving. You need to straighten out that format right meow before someone gets hurt.
messages.401: License and registration... meow. I'm going to need to see some credentials right meow. You can't just access this area without proper authorization. What do you think this is right meow, a free-for-all?
messages.402: Meow listen here, this is a toll road. You're going to need to pay up right meow before you can proceed. No free rides on this highway, no matter how fast you're going right meow.
messages.403: This area is restricted, friend. I'm afraid I can't let you through right meow. You don't have clearance for this part of the highway. Meow, turn around and find another route.
messages.404: Do you know where you are right meow? Because this page doesn't exist. You're lost on the information superhighway. Maybe you should have used a map... right meow.
messages.405: That maneuver is illegal on this highway. You can't use that HTTP method here right meow. Meow, you need to learn the rules of the road before you hurt someone.
messages.406: Your vehicle doesn't match the required format right meow. The content type you're requesting isn't acceptable. Meow, you need to get that fixed.
messages.408: You've been sitting at this stop for too long right meow. Either move along or I'm going to have to write you a ticket. The connection timed out, no matter what excuse you have right meow.
messages.409: There's a conflict here right meow. Two data streams are trying to use the same lane. That's a violation. Meow, you need to resolve this before proceeding.
messages.410: This road has been permanently closed. It's gone, demolished, no longer exists right meow. You can't drive on a road that isn't there anymore. What part of 'gone' do you not understand right meow?
messages.413: Your payload is way over the weight limit right meow. That's a serious violation. You're going to need to lighten your load before I can let you through. Right meow, your data is too large.
messages.429: Do you know how fast you were going right meow? I clocked you at way too many requests per second. Slow down right meow before you cause an accident! This is your final warning.
messages.500: The station has a malfunction right meow. Our internal systems are down. Meow, this is embarrassing. The server encountered an error. We need to get this fixed right meow.
messages.502: The gateway is blocked right meow. There's no way through. The upstream connection failed. Maybe you should try another route right meow.
messages.503: This highway is closed for maintenance right meow. Service is temporarily unavailable. Come back later when the road is open again. Check back in an hour or so... right meow.
messages.504: The checkpoint isn't responding right meow. The gateway timed out. We've been waiting here forever. Maybe something is wrong up ahead right meow.
messages.default: Do you know why I pulled you over? Your request was clocked at excessive speeds on the information superhighway.

descriptions.400: Next time, double-check your syntax right meow. Meow, it's not that hard.
descriptions.401: Always carry your credentials. You never know when you'll need them right meow.
descriptions.402: The snozberries taste like snozberries... but you still have to pay the toll right meow.
descriptions.403: Don't go where you're not allowed right meow. That's a good way to get arrested.
descriptions.404: Not all who wander are lost, but you definitely are right meow.
descriptions.405: Learn the proper methods right meow. You can't just make up your own rules.
descriptions.406: Get your formats in order right meow. This is a professional highway.
descriptions.408: Time is money, friend. We don't have all day right meow.
descriptions.409: Can't we all just get along right meow? Apparently not.
descriptions.410: Some roads close forever. You need to accept that and move on right meow.
descriptions.413: Size matters on the highway. Your payload is too big right meow.
descriptions.429: Slow down right meow! This isn't the Autobahn.
descriptions.500: Even troopers make mistakes sometimes. We'll fix this right meow.
descriptions.502: The gateway's closed right meow. Not our problem.
descriptions.503: Highway's closed. Go get some coffee and come back later... right meow.
descriptions.504: Patience is a virtue. The gateway will respond eventually... right meow.
descriptions.default: Littering and... littering and... smoking the reefer.

footers.400: Do we look like the three stooges to you? Fix your request syntax right meow!
footers.401: These boys get that syrup in 'em, they get all antsy in their pantsy.
footers.402: The snozberries taste like snozberries, but they aren't free.
footers.404: Not so funny meow, is it?
footers.405: Easy, Rod. Easy, Rod. Rod! What did I just say?
footers.410: The road is gone forever. Totally gone. Super gone.
footers.429: Our shenanigans are cheeky and fun. Your errors are cruel and tragic.
footers.503: The highway is closed. Probably for the best.
footers.504: Am I saying meow? Do I look like a cat to you?
